Total # of neighbors = 12013
Ave neighs/atom = 96.104000
Neighbor list builds = 1500
Dangerous builds not checked

variable	p equal f_ave_p

print	"Average virial pressure from Langevin MD: $p"
Average virial pressure from Langevin MD: 1.32628176229981
unfix ave_p
unfix 2

#=====NVT MD run====#
reset_timestep	0

fix		ave_p all ave/time ${nintervals} ${ave_one} ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 60 ${ave_one} ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 60 500 ${prodlength} c_p_all
fix		ave_p all ave/time 60 500 30000 c_p_all
unfix	1
fix		1 all nvt temp  ${temperature} ${temperature} 0.2
fix		1 all nvt temp  1.0 ${temperature} 0.2
fix		1 all nvt temp  1.0 1.0 0.2

thermo		200

log		log.mdnvt.txt
